Title: Slap-Ass: In Recovery
Writer: Keegan-Michael Key (creator), Jordan Peele (creator), Rebecca Drysdale, Colton Dunn, Phil Augusta Jackson, Jay Martel, Ian Roberts, Alex Rubens, Charlie Sanders, Rich Talarico
Actors: Bert Belasco, Mekia Cox, Keegan-Michael Key, Michael McLafferty
Plot: A baseball player deals with his addiction to slapping ass, a mobster takes vengeance on someone who crossed him, and Steve Urkel drives a man insane.
